summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackClarins' Total Cleansing Oil & Makeup Remover is an easy-rinse cleansing oil water-activates into a silky milk that removes long-wearing, heavy and waterproof makeup and pollutants while preserving the skin's microbiota.
details: DetailsBenefitsRemoves long-wearing, heavy, and waterproof makeup and pollutantsLeaves skin soft, clean, and comfortablePreserves a healthy balance of the skin's microbiotaSafe for use on face, eyes, and lipsKey IngredientsOrganic Golden Gentian* and Organic Lemon Balm* extracts soothe and softenMoringa extract helps detoxify skin by eliminating pollutants.*Organic ingredients are produced in accordance with European regulation (CE 2018/848).Research Results95% Supple skin*95% Texture glides on easily**82% Removes heavy makeup****Satisfaction test - 112 women - after 14 days of use**Satisfaction test - 112 women - after 1st application***Satisfaction test - 40 subjects wearing heavy/long-wearing makeup - after 14 days of useItem 2620950How To UseApply Total Cleansing Oil to dry skin and mix with water to emulsify into a white milk. Rinse with water and follow with Toning Lotion.IngredientsHelianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, C9-12 Alkane, Peg-20 Glyceryl Triisostearate, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, Aqua/Water/Eau, Propanediol, Parfum/Fragrance, Tocopherol, Melissa Officinalis Leaf Extract, Sodium Citrate, Gentiana Lutea Extract, Citric Acid, Capsicum Annuum Fruit Extract, Maltodextrin, Moringa Oleifera Seed Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract [V3545A].Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply Total Cleansing Oil to dry skin and mix with water to emulsify into a white milk. Rinse with water and follow with Toning Lotion.

reviews.headline: Does the job!
reviews.comments: This is an amazing pre cleanser! It easily gets off all your makeup. I recently tried a different oil cleanser because it was a tad bit cheaper and its not even close to this one. I will be purchasing this one from now on.

reviews.headline: Best make up cleanser
reviews.comments: Love this product! It removes waterproof mascara.

reviews.headline: Smells rancid
reviews.comments: This cleanser works great but I cant get past the smell and I'll use the rest but won't buy again.

reviews.headline: Love Clarins
reviews.comments: So glad I bought this.  Takes off the waterproof makeup...including mascara and lipstick !!  Outstanding....moisturizes your face and washes clean.  Clarins is a wonderful product

reviews.headline: Best cleansing oil ever!
reviews.comments: I really do enjoy this oil. The scent is nice, and the oil does not feel too heavy or sticky on my skin. Alongside makeup removal, I noticed it helps with sebum control. A very useful skincare product and great for your skin!

reviews.headline: Great for sensitive skin!
reviews.comments: Removes all makeup and sunscreen easily! Skin feels soft and clean afterwards and my sensitive skin isnt irritated at all.

reviews.headline: Love this oil cleanser!
reviews.comments: I really love this cleanser, it removes all my make up in one go, and a little goes a long way! It is not drying at all. I wish it wasn't this expensive, but I will defo repurchase it.

reviews.headline: My favorite cleansing oil
reviews.comments: I've tried mixing my own DIY oil blends for removing makeup as it would save a lot of money in the long run, but I end up with a greasy face or a mess that refuses to rinse off. Clarins' is honestly little more than glorified Sunflower Oil (fancy I know!) but it does the trick! The only issue with my bottle is it's slightly rancid (probably not stored in the right conditions instore), so I can't comment on the fragrance as it's half-gone. But the product still works well. I don't use it for removing eye makeup, only to remove foundation/concealer etc. The pump dispenses easily, and with a simple twist to the left, it seals shut for travel, the oil itself glides on easily and has a nice silky texture. It dissolves makeup well and it washes off in seconds, without leaving my already-oily skin, any more oily. I then follow with a normal gel cleanser. I've used a couple of oil cleansers in the past and this one is my favorite. I just wish it cost a bit less...I can't see it lasting for much more than a month, based on how much I've already gone through in the last few days. -> My 'Ulta Beauty Top 7 must-have list' (My 7 favorite beauty products of all time, focusing mainly on my purchases at Ulta) < - < 1. Hair Loss Treatment: Divine Herbal Hair Oil < 2. Eye Cream: Clinique All about eyes < 3. Lip Gloss: Clarins Lip Comfort Oil < 4. Makeup Remover: Lancome Bi Facil < 5. Pigmentation + Anti-Aging Serum: Divine Herbal Facial Treatment Serum < 6. Eyeliner: Ulta Beauty Gel Eyeliner Pencil < 7. Moisturizer: 'Lush' – Enzymion

reviews.headline: Bang for my buck!
reviews.comments: Okay this is like $40, BUT it lasted me months. Maybe 4? You could get 5 if you do one pump i think. I wear alot of makeup and i always go in with a remover then my makeup eraser to get residue off. This gets eye makeup off with ease and i never was rubbing my eyes with the eraser like some other products. I dont feel the greasy feeling after and i have acne skin, this didn't seem to clog pores. I only needed 1 pump but did two to reeealy spread it around. It's some money but for how long it lasted i am going to repurchase and feel confident that i dont need to work hard to get my makeup off at the end of the day. :)!

faceoff_positive.headline: My favorite cleansing oil

faceoff_negative.comments: I really wanted to consider this as I look for a cleansing oil to commit to... and have to say I'm rather shocked that Clarins has any product, particularly when cleansing and can be inhaled, this ingredient : PEG-20 GLYCERYL TRIISOSTEARATE; there really is no reason to have any of the chemical ingredients in a cleansing OIL
faceoff_negative.headline: Ingredient Concerns
